page.title: 06FORE STREET,WELLINGTON
page.content: From the central traffic lights, this street, the old A38, leads west- wards into{Mantle Street }and out of town. Between this street and North Street, centrally, is a new covered shopping precinct called the{Corn Hill {Arcade}- once the old Town Hall.This houses an Estate Agent, a Picture Framing Gallery, a Bazaar, a Cafe, and shops:Bakery, Wool, Basketware, Fruit & Vegetables, Cards, Second-hand Furniture, & Cookery Utensil Shop. On the outside is a path leding between the two roads. Here we have a Cycle Shop, a Bookshop, a Hairdresser's, a Watch Repairer, & a Replacement Window Shop. On Fore Street itself we have the Library, the Museum, a Doctors' Surgery (for 3 Doctors), 4 Banks, & a Public House.
